dynamic_line.yes: Hello there.  Nice to see you again.
dynamic_line.no: A new face at the mill?  Who might you be?

responses.text: I'd like to ask you a few questions.
Can I purchase some of your wares?

dynamic_line.yes: I mean, I don't remember a whole lot about this job I had, I just know that I managed this lumbermill and sold wood to… somebody.  I think it was some sort of company.  I'm just glad I remember my coworkers here, my <name_g>s.  They're helping me to try and remember who I was before all this.  You see, that's the weird thing; I remember what my job was and how to do it the right way, but I don't know where I learned that, or who taught me.  I just know that we're in this together, and we're gonna make it through Hell if we have too.
